pullRequest.title: Added Industrial Miner & Removed Digital Miner
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

The Digital Miner has been deprecated for a very long time, now it's finally been removed.
This Pull Request proposes a new machine that functions similar but is much more performance-friendly. It is also much more balanced as it consumes fuel to run.
It features beautiful animations and particle effects.
When operating this machine, there will be a short warm up animation with the Pistons moving up and down.
Here's a video showcase:
https://youtu.be/1hvv6hHNCiI
Changes


Removed Digital Miner
Added Industrial Miner
Added Advanced Industrial Miner
Also added Dried Kelp blocks to the Coal Generator

Related Issues


Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: Dried Kelp Blocks are now valid coal generator fuel
The Advanced Miner now preserves buckets
Updated lore for advanced industrial miner
